description: The file defines a Flutter widget-based home page for a spiritual calendar app, including UI components, data presentation, and interactions.

classes.name: HomeCard
classes.description: A reusable card widget with standardized margins and padding, used for consistent UI layout.

classes.name: HomePage
classes.description: Main stateful widget displaying today's calendar details, festivals, quick actions, and stats.

classes.name: _HomePageState
classes.description: State class managing data fetching, date handling, and building the UI components.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for the home page layout including cards, festival info, and stats.

methods.name: _chip
methods.description: Creates a chip widget with provided text, used for displaying date details.

methods.name: _statTile
methods.description: Builds a stylized tile showing statistical data like Japa count and quiz streak.
